content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Max. I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price. What would you be willing to pay for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would be willing to pay 500 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's too low for me, Max. I'm looking for a higher price for my apartment. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 550 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a bit better, but I'm still hoping for more. This is a great apartment in a prime location, remember? It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 600 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's getting closer to my expectations, Max. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, close to all important facilities. I'm still hoping for a bit more though.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 650 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a reasonable offer, Max. I appreciate your understanding of the value of the apartment. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, close to all important facilities. I'll accept the price of 650 euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [650] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany
